<title level="1" pfs="">[Nishkiv The Knife](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2220)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Nishkiv The Knife](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2220)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 37</row>

**Perception** +5

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (6), [_lesser healing potions_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 20

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Double Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Nishkiv makes two dagger Strikes against the same target. If his first attack hits, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the second attack. The multiple attack penalty applies to these attacks as normal.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Nishkiv deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Nishkiv The Knife

text: Nishkiv The Knife Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 25 Unspecific Lore : DC 23 Specific Lore : DC 20 Nishkiv The Knife Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 37 Perception +5 Languages Common, Jotun Skills Acrobatics +7, Athletics +4, Deception +7, Society +6, Stealth +7 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +1 Wis +0 Cha +2 Items daggers (6), lesser healing potions (3), Leather Armor --- AC 16 Fort +6 Ref +9 Will +5 HP 20 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, Finesse, thrown 10 ft., versatile S), Damage 1d4+1 piercing Ranged Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, Finesse, thrown 10 ft., versatile S), Damage 1d4+1 piercing Double Strike Two Actions Nishkiv makes two dagger Strikes against the same target. If his first attack hits, the target is flat-footed to the second attack. The multiple attack penalty applies to these attacks as normal. Sneak Attack Nishkiv deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
